mapper.select: SELECT A.COMPANYID , A.SHIFTID , A.FACTORYID ,(SELECT FACTORYNAME FROM DSP_FACTORY WHERE FACTORYID IN (A.FACTORYID)) AS FACTORYNAME , A.SHIFTNAME , A.SHIFTTYPE , A.STARTTIME , A.ENDTIME , A.CREATOR , FORMAT(A.CREATETIME, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') AS CREATETIME , A.EVENT , A.EVENTUSER , FORMAT(A.EVENTTIME, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') AS EVENTTIME , A.ISUSABLE FROM DSP_SHIFT A WHERE 1=1

update.foreach: UPDATE DSP_SHIFT SET ISUSABLE= 'N' ,EVENTUSER = 'idrAdmin' ,EVENTTIME = GETDATE() WHERE COMPANYID = 'dx' AND FACTORYID = #{data.factoryid} AND SHIFTID = #{data.shiftid}
